website_summaries.verdict: Hidden front and a wider frame to fit into your cabinet.
pros: Compact control panel can be hidden away easily
Reheat sensor does a good job of getting food to the right temperature
cons: Doesn't fit completely flush against the cabinet

customer_reviews.title: Good  but needs a control panel light
customer_reviews.text: The Sharp Microwave Drawer Oven is a great idea that offers the convenience of not having to stoop over to load or operate the controls. But this convenience is marred by the execution of the tilt-out control panel. The surface material looks cheap and worse, the text is medium gray on black making it hard to read. This could have been easily solved by adding a simple backlight, something I would have expected on a premium product. I was so annoyed by this that I added my own light using a battery-p owered motion-sensing LED strip positioned just above the panel. it works great and even makes the control panel surface look better...
customer_reviews.author: Jay Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Heats things up great. Closed super quiet when first installed but now ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves not having to reach up and pull a M/O door open above the stove anymore. Heats things up great. Closed super quiet when first installed but now closes with a bit of a thud. Called Sharp re warranty--they dropped the ball after several attempts--never did send anyone out to fix it yet after waiting two months so far. May have been a $1200 mistake--don't know for sure yet.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Already broken - 1 year in
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this microwave for barely over a year, and it has broken. The microwave will only work now if you hold the door shut. Since our new kitchen was literally built around this size microwave, I unfortunately have no choice to replace with a different brand since they are different sizes. Gotta love their 1 year warranty that seems to cover only how long it will work. Cannot recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Newheiser

customer_reviews.title: So frustrating! I purchased this item (and was so ...
customer_reviews.text: So frustrating! I purchased this item (and was so looking forward to it based on product reviews), installed it, plugged it in with glee; the welcome instructions came on the dash, I put something in the microwave and it does NOTHING! I’m frustrated because I don’t want to have someone come and repair it. I paid a TON of money for it and would prefer to exchange it for a new one but amazon doesn’t provide that option. HELP!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why  not all of the 30-inches are not part of the oven area??
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand why this unit is 30-inches. Most of the unit is not within the oven space. It just takes up more cabinet space. I expected the 30-inch unit to have a wider cooking area than the 24-inch unit. Not so.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Fishing

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect fit. Although with the Ikea housing this fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I'd spend this much on a microwave... But it completely fits with my completely modern kitchen. I didn't want to lose counter space, and I have just a range hood over the oven. This was a perfect fit. Although with the Ikea housing this fits into, it isn't 100% flush with the other cabinet doors. That's my only gripe. The "reheat" sensor button has gotten every single dish to the perfect temperature. A full cup of coffee doesn't spill a drop when opening and closing the door. Plus the added bonus of every person coming over saying "holy crap, that's a microwave?!"
customer_reviews.author: C. McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Opening on cabinet for previous model will need a slight adjustment for the new one to fit.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave replaced one which we installed when we built our house in 2011. The only difference is the cabinet had to be notched out for it to be installed into the opening due to a slight change in the new microwave. The display is now concealed behind a flap and has to be opened to use the new model. The price is quite a bit overinflated in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hayes

customer_reviews.title: 18 months- microwave does not work anymore!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd order. First one was returned due to damaged unit (dents). This one came intact. However packaging can be better. Opened the box but all protective styro were crumpled - good thing I did not see any physical damages. It works fine and its quiet. Update: 18 months since purchased. Unit is now broken with keypad not working!!! Sharp support line no help at all since the 1 yr warranty is already up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Alvin Dilayre

customer_reviews.title: We've had this microwave oven for almost 4 years and ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this microwave oven for almost 4 years and it works very well. We will be moving soon and I am going to purchase this microwave oven for our condo in the kitchen remodel. You can't beat the convenience of the appliance. I do not find it hard to clean and it does reheat food quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in Shredded Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Looks like we got a returned unit shiipped to us, manufacturers packaging appeared to have been opened and resealed. When we opened the box, cardboard bracing structures were thrown to one side, styrofoam padding was shredded and unit was cattywumpus in box and bent up and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... mediocre reviews about this product and was not too happy about spending over $1
customer_reviews.text: I know I read some mediocre reviews about this product and was not too happy about spending over $1,000 for a product with such reviews, but it fit well into our new kitchen design, so I figured I would take a chance. The product came with no damage and was installed by our contractor. I am most pleasantly surprised at how much I like it. It looks great, opens and closes well, and heats very quickly. What else could you ask from a microwave? I am very pleased with this product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: We renovated our kitchen and upgraded our microwave. I looked at this product in the 24 inch size but we needed the 30 inch to fit the space we have. I was a bit nervous as some of the reviews on amazon are less than stellar (just for the 30 inch size strangely) but so far our product has lived up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sitamama

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love this Sharp microwave drawer oven. It sets beautifully in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: David Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: I prefer traditional microwave instead of drawer model
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an older version from the same company. Everything is same as before except the operation panel. It's difficult to read the buttons since the microwave sits under the counter. I understand they designed it to hide the panel when not in use... but I don't think it's necessary. To be honest I'd rather a traditional microwave as the height is small and many things don't fit in it. But we inherited it when we bought the house and the space can't be used for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: JosieB

customer_reviews.title: What a hassle and disappointment! Where is the NO STARS option
customer_reviews.text: What a hassle and disappointment! Where is the NO STARS option? We've had service technicians out twice and we're still having the door open when we want it to close and sometimes the microwave doesn't warm the food unless we press hard on the door after closing it. This appliance is not worth the high price. Please, Sharp, it's time to go back to the drawing board on this product. We wish we had never purchased this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisQbn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and so far is working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and so far is working perfectly. A little pricey but it sure solved a problem for us in a recent remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: Flush and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. It doesn’t have a handle so you can’t hit your leg which makes it easy to install at waist height or lower. All the b**ches were really impressed and that’s really important. It’s a good idea to get an extended warranty because a circuit board randomly blew out. Sharp customer service was good and came out and fixed it because it was under warranty and put me back on track to impressing dem hoez
customer_reviews.author: IMH

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but is pricy
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Compared to a counter top model it is very expensive, but if you need to conserve counter space it is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Winick

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time looked great, installed it and it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time looked great, installed it and it didn't work. I've been waiting for follow-up from Sharp service agent.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Ann

customer_reviews.title: great product. have had it for a few months
customer_reviews.text: great product. have had it for a few months. everyone compliments it and it saved us from needing to buy a microwave that sits on the counter
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the performance
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying having a microwave drawer. No counter space needed. Very pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this item TWICE and it arrived damaged BOTH times ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item TWICE and it arrived damaged BOTH times. Safe to say we were not ordering it a third time.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Box looked perfect both times
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damage for the 2nd time. Box looked perfect both times, so I suspect some issue with the interior packaging. Trying one last time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Man I wish I would read the reviews before purchasing,THIS THING IS HORRIBLE!!! After a thousand bucks, plus $400 to have the P.O.S. installed...it doesn't heat food. I could have copied the other negative reviews verbatim. Doesn't heat food, customer support is horrible, switched breaker off and on which doesn't work, etc. Unfortunately, I had an enclosure custom built for this piece of crap so now I'm stuck waiting for whatever solution Sharp get's around to proposing... If you're still researching your decision, don't walk, RUN from this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient so far. No problems. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Romy

customer_reviews.title: We both LOVE this microwave and find it so convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6'4 and I am almost 5" tall. We both LOVE this microwave and find it so convenient to use. It makes me wonder why we thought it was acceptable to have a huge appliance sitting on the counter top all these years. So easy to keep clean, so sleek and roomy, a highlight of the newly designed kitchen that my husband built by himself. It is the only appliance in our central island. Everyone who uses it wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Forte

customer_reviews.title: Will not last
customer_reviews.text: You'd figure a microwave that is over $1k would last. This microwave was fantastic while it worked although if you're impatient the drawer does open and close a little on the slow side, but that wasn't really a deal breaker. The largest disappointment is that after 5 years, all we have is a built-in piece of junk that doesn't work. I've had $50 microwaves that have lasted longer! After a good amount of google research this unfortunately does not seem to be an atypical occurrence with Sharp microwaves. I would avoid this like the plague unless you like throwing away your money. :/
customer_reviews.author: JollyJoben

customer_reviews.title: Sharp as a manufacture
customer_reviews.text: For those looking for a different microwave, you might be interested in the fact that Sharp brand make at least 50% of these microwaves, other manufactures just put their name on them. Beware !!
customer_reviews.author: Terri P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a year - then the display died ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a year - then the display died out - sharp said to call a repairman from another state. Lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Tonic
